title: ollama/ollama
summary: The official Ollama CLI and server for running large language models locally with an OpenAI-compatible API.

title: langchain-ai/langchain
summary: LangChain’s Ollama integration lets you plug any local model served by Ollama into chains, agents, retrieval pipelines, etc.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official async/sync Python client for Ollama; install via pip install ollama.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official TypeScript/JavaScript client for Node and browsers; npm install ollama.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich ChatGPT-style web UI for any Ollama model; runs in Docker.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with Spring Boot starters; Maven Central artifact.

title: ollama-rails
summary: Ruby gem wrapping the Ollama REST API; gem install ollama.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Cross-platform TUI (terminal UI) for chatting with Ollama models; built with Go.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into a GitHub Copilot replacement.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Lightweight Flutter desktop app for chatting with local Ollama models.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration that uses Ollama as a generator/embedder in RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community recipes: function-calling, vision, fine-tune, Docker Compose stacks, etc.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart for deploying Ollama server and models on Kubernetes.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official Docker images and compose examples for CPU/GPU inference.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix flake that packages Ollama and curated model derivations for reproducible deployments.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that adds a “Chat with local model” pane using Ollama.

title: ollama-logseq
summary: Logseq plugin for summarizing blocks or generating text via Ollama.

title: ollama-telegram
summary: Telegram bot that proxies chats to your local Ollama instance with per-user quotas.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord.py bot that adds /ask slash commands backed by any Ollama model.

title: ollama-macos-menu
summary: Swift native macOS menu-bar app for quick chat and model switching.
